channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0253; 06:01AM; 13200 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3spubHM; #GranadaHills; Two vehicle traffic collision with one adult male deceased and remains at scene. No other injured persons. One or more street lanes will remain closed in the area until the LAPD investigation and Medical Examiner operations are complete, unknown duration. Expect congestion and delay. Please avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #663) and Medical Examiner.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E18 E287 E87 E91 EM15 HR3 RA18 RA87 T87 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1375; 05:14PM; 2400 N Weid Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/47N2j0o; Hollywood Hills; 1/4 acre slow moving, no structures threatened.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 E227 E229 E235 E27 E290 E35 E41 E82 E90 EM11 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA27 SO1 T27 T29 T35 T90; CH5; 12; David Ortiz

title.a: CONCLUDED Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation 08/22/2023 INC#1955

item.description: CONCLUDED Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation; INC#1955; 11:00AM; 1720 E Chavez Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E70ttO; Boyle Heights; LAFD has assisted in moving the last non-critical patient (of the 213) and the incident will begin to demobilize. Any further questions are directed to White Memorial. ; Central Bureau; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0145; 05:53AM; 9800 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/45igQQd; Pacoima; KNOCKDOWN: Over 100 firefighters extinguished the fire in two hours and 20 minutes with no injuries reported. A portion of the LAFD resources will remain on scene through the morning for the extensive overhaul operation utilizing heavy equipment. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E227 E239 E24 E273 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E87 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 HE1 HR3 RA77 RA889 RA898 RA98 RS3 SO1 SQ87 T27 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation 08/22/2023 INC#1955

item.description: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation; INC#1955; 05:27AM; 1720 E Chavez Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E70ttO; Boyle Heights; A press conference will be held at 7:00AM at 1820 Cesar Chavez Ave. Representatives from White Memorial and LAFD will be speaking. 17 critical patients have been transported with more patients being prepared for transport. The movement of the non-critical patients to other facilities within White Memorial is continuing. Those with family members at the Specialty Care Center (the only building affected) can contact the main White Memorial number for information 323-268-5000.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC10 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM21 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E220 E235 E25 E260 E3 E4 E44 E47 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 PI3 PI4 RA1 RA11 RA12 RA15 RA2 RA20 RA209 RA21 RA246 RA25 RA266 RA3 RA35 RA4 RA46 RA47 RA57 RA76 RA79 RA801 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA82 RA86 RA9 RA900 SO1 T1 T10 T2 T20 T3 T35 T60 T9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0145; 03:33AM; 9800 N San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/45igQQd; Pacoima; Firefighters have extinguished the bulk of the auto fires and are shutting down the ladder pipe operations to transition into an offensive attack with handlines because the remaining fire is deep seated in stacks of tires. No injuries reported. No additional resources anticipated. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E227 E239 E24 E273 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E87 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 HE1 HR3 RA77 RA889 RA898 RA98 RS3 SO1 SQ87 T27 T39 T73 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0145; 04:07AM; 12400 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ONOuq5; Pacoima; This incident is now at the Greater Alarm status. The fire location is updated to an auto yard (fenced) with multiple autos fully involved (stacked). There have been challenges with water supply at hydrants and firefighters are working to establish alternate supplies. This is a defensive operation with ladder pipe and large diameter hand lines in place. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E227 E275 E287 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA77 RA889 RA898 RA98 SO1 SQ87 T27 T75 T87 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation 08/22/2023 INC#1955

item.description: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation; INC#1955; 03:50AM; 1720 E Chavez Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E70ttO; Boyle Heights; The incident is stabilizing with an updated count for patients requiring LAFD transport of 21. The transportation is underway. The bulk of the 241 patients will be moved to the South Tower at White Memorial as only the Specialty Care Center was affected by the power outage. LAFD is able to release some of the rescue ambulances back to their respective districts. Any questions regarding the power outage are referred to White Memorial. Media staging remains at Michigan Ave x N Boyle Ave.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC10 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM21 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E12 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E220 E235 E25 E260 E3 E4 E44 E47 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 PI3 PI4 RA1 RA11 RA12 RA15 RA2 RA20 RA209 RA21 RA25 RA3 RA35 RA4 RA46 RA47 RA801 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 RA900 SO1 T1 T10 T2 T20 T3 T35 T60 T9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0145; 03:33AM; 12400 W Branford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ONOuq5; Pacoima; One story (approx 75'x75') commercial building (auto body/tire shop) with fire showing upon arrival. Two additional task forces were requested. A defensive operation was initiated and located multiple autos fully involved inside the structure.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E227 E275 E289 E290 E298 E7 E75 E77 E81 E89 E98 EM15 HR3 RA889 RA898 RA98 SO1 T27 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation 08/22/2023 INC#1955

item.description: Update Automatic Alarm - Medical Evacuation; INC#1955; 02:12AM; 1720 E Chavez Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E70ttO; Boyle Heights; A total of 241 patients are affected by the power outage in one building (Specialty Care Center) at White Memorial Hospital campus. A total of 30 patients deemed critical requiring LAFD ambulance transportation to a new hospital. Firefighters are bringing them down to the ground floor, assisting ventilations as required, for transport. The remaining 211 patients are non-critical and will be moved to a different building on campus (South Tower). LAFD will assist White Memorial staff, as needed, in the move. Any questions regarding the outage are referred to White Memorial. LAFD Media staging remains at Michigan Av x N Boyle Ave.; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM21 CM22 E1 E10 E11 E14 E15 E16 E17 E2 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E220 E235 E25 E3 E4 E44 E47 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 PI3 PI4 RA1 RA11 RA12 RA15 RA2 RA20 RA209 RA21 RA25 RA3 RA35 RA4 RA46 RA47 RA801 RA803 RA809 RA810 RA9 RA900 SO1 T1 T10 T2 T20 T3 T35 T9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
